#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>
#include<stdbool.h>
#include<map>
#include<queue>
#include<stack>
#include<list>
#include<limits.h>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define LL long long int
 
struct team
{
	LL score;
	int pos;
};
 
bool teamsort(struct team t1,struct team t2)
{
	if(t1.score>t2.score)
		return true;
	if(t1.score==t2.score&&t1.pos<t2.pos)
		return true;
	return false;
}
 
int main()
{
	int N;
	LL S,M;
	int i;
	scanf("%d",&N);
	vector<struct team> teams(N);
	for(i=0;i<N;i++)
	{
		scanf("%lld%lld",&S,&M);
		teams[i].score=S*M;
		teams[i].pos=i+1;
	}
	int Q,K;
	sort(teams.begin(),teams.end(),teamsort);
	scanf("%d",&Q);
	while(Q)
	{
		scanf("%d",&K);
		printf("%d\n",teams[K-1].pos);
		--Q;
	}
	return 0;
}
